query: Build the Docker image and verify the containerized gateway starts and passes health checks
expected_behavior: docker build . completes without errors using the multi-stage Dockerfile
The final image runs as a non-root user (verify with 'docker run ... whoami')
The container starts and the Gateway listens on port 18789
GET http://localhost:18789/health returns HTTP 200 with a JSON status payload
The HEALTHCHECK instruction in the Dockerfile causes 'docker ps' to show status 'healthy' within 30 seconds
